text.title: West Central Florida
text.author: Wikivoyage community (see URL)
text.head: West Central Florida
text.p: West Central Florida is in the state of Florida in the United States. It includes Citrus, Hernando, Hillsborough, Manatee Pasco, Pinellas, Polk and Sumter counties.
text.head: Cities

list.item: - the largest city in West Central Florida.

text.head: Other destinations
By plane
text.p: The largest airport in the region is Tampa International Airport ( TPA ) on the western side of Tampa. TIA serves dozens of destinations, with daily flights to most major cities in the US and almost every major airline hub. The Tampa-Atlanta route carries the most passengers of any route with nearly 3 times as many passengers as the second largest destination Charlotte. The largest airlines in/out of TIA are American, Delta, and Southwest.

Directly across the bay and just 10 miles from TIA is St. Petersburg-Clearwater International Airport ( PIE ), which served mostly by budget airlines and used for private aviation. It is a hub for Allegiant Air which flies to about two dozen small airports throughout the Midwest & Northeast. As of February 2011, it is also served by: Frontier Airlines to Milwaukee & Omaha (both seasonal); Air Transat to Halifax & Toronto (both seasonal); Sunwing Airlines to Toronto; Vision Air to Gulfport-Biloxi; & Locair to Marsh Harbour & Treasure Cay.
Sarasota-Bradenton International Airport ( SRQ ) is located between Sarasota and Bradenton and is served by American, Delta, JetBlue, and United. About half of the routes are seasonal.
text.head: State parks

list.item: Crystal River Archaeological State Park, 3400 N. Museum Point, ☏ +1 352 795-3817 . 8AM to sundown. A National Historic Landmark. Next to the Crystal River Preserve State Park.
Crystal River Preserve State Park, 3266 N. Sailboat Avenue, ☏ +1 352 563-0450 . 8AM to sundown. Next to the Crystal River Archaeological State Park
Dade Battlefield Historic State Park, 7200 CR 603, Bushnell, ☏ +1 352 793-4781 . 8AM to sundown.
Judah P. Benjamin Confederate Memorial at Gamble Plantation Historic State Park, 3708 Patten Avenue, Ellenton, ☏ +1 941 723-4536 . 8AM to sunset.
Lake Manatee State Park, 20007 State Road 64 East, Bradenton, ☏ +1 941 741-3028 . 8AM to sunset.
Madira Bickel Mound State Archaeological Site, 955 Bayshore Drive, Terra Ceia, ☏ +1 941 723-4536 . 8AM to sunset.
